messages.subject: Re: Fw: [AHA] HAVE A HEART  MISSING CHILD
messages.msgSnippet: Well, gang, we all fall for this stuff from time to time.  This one s been on the Current
messages.messageBody:
Well, gang, we all fall for this stuff from time to time. This one's been on
the
<A HREF="http://urbanlegends.miningco.com/library/blhoax.htm">Current
Internet Hoaxes, urban legends, and other digital lies - Urban Legends and
Folklore
</A> list for a while now. Not true. Go back to this site from time to
time to check on these things before we jump on the bandwagon... No biggie -
I've fallen for this stuff a bunch of times, too. I keep this page
bookmarked and go to it when someone forwards me this type of info. Love to
you all, Lynnie

messages.subject: Fw: [AHA] HAVE A HEART  MISSING CHILD
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: margie rebaza <margiesue@...>
To: <AHA@onelist.com>; <Christmoms-owner@onelist.com>;
<cochmschls@onelist.com>; <EHCO@onelist.com>; <FrugalHS@onelist.com>;
GUILLERMO <lospico@...>; <HomBreck@...>;
<homeschoolzone@onelist.com>; <JOZDEVIL00@...>; Milo L. Steffen II
<mlsii@...>; leslie <personalshopper@...>;
<momtomom@onelist.com>; <schoolathome@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 9:58 AM
Subject: [AHA] HAVE A HEART MISSING CHILD


> From: margie rebaza <margiesue@...>
>
> Unfortunately the original message did not transfer the picture or the
> e-mail address of the sender. However, if one wants to follow up there
> is a phone numberof the police department.
>
> Margie
>
>
> Please Angels ..... Read and forward !!!!!!!!!!!!
> [Unable to display image]
>
> My name is Christine Schmidt. I live in Mounds View, Minnesota and my
>
> little 20 month old girl is missing. Her name is Krystava Patients
> Schmidt.
>
> She was last seen with an acquaintance of mine named Becky (Rebecca)
> Lynn Dearmond on July 10, 1997. Becky took my grandmother's car and
> Krystava. The car is a 1997 blue Neon license plate number ANX 437.
> I
> need your
> help....please! I am sending a photo with this letter in hopes that
> you
> will pass this letter to everyone you know on the Internet and print
> the photo of Krystava and post it wherever you can in your
> neighborhood. If you
> have seen her, or suspect anything suspicious, please contact the
> Mounds
> View Police at (612) 484-9155 as soon as possible. PLEASE forward
> this
> letter to as many people you know and post the picture of my little
> girl
> wherever you can. Please pray for us too!
>
> Thank you in advance for your support and cooperation.
>
> Christine Schmidt
>
> Guys,
> If you are ever gonna have at least a little compassion, please
> have
> it now. I can't even imagine the pain this lady is going through. Just
> send
> it to everyone you know. Take 10 minutes and do this, even if you don't
> have
> AOL 4.0 just send it one to other people, they might and you might help
> find
> a little missing child. Pray for her and her family.
>
> It only really takes less then 2 minutes. >>
>
>
>
> --
> S
>
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> Attention ONElist list owners.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Check out the new "DEFAULT MODERATED STATUS" option. See homepage.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
